name: I'm not just a horse
description:
"I'm not just a horse" is an endless side-scrolling runner where the ceiling and the floor are magnetic. This is an entry for ScoreSpace Jam #18, a 72-hour game jam with focus on both game development and streaming. All content is original.

Space (Press) - Quick and small jump

Space (Hold) - Charge for higher jump

alexanbg

Nikosan
